zone.line: For a dead body am I not to house
With me goes it as a kat with a mouse
The Lord.
Now good, it is to thee permitted
Draw this spirit of his fountain from,
And lead him, canst thou him percieve
To thy way with below,
And stand ashamed, when thou confess must:
A good man in his dark throng,
Is thus of the right way well knowing
Mephistopheles
Very good! but lasts it not long
To me is for my wager much not anxious
When I to my design arrive
Permit me you to me Triumph in full breast:
Dust shall ye eat, and with pleasure
Like my nurse, the famous snake
The Lord
Thou darest even then only free to appear;
I have thy like not hated
